MetaData.Description: Most APSIM crop or plant modules do not require extra user input. Crop specific parameters are either provided for your chosen soil, or are captured as part of the standard model validation process.

skiprow_default.description: skip row default; 0 = none, 1 = single, 2 = double

specific_lw.description: g/m2 GAC 71/72, Hoffman and Rawlins 1971, Ben-Porath

wt_area_max.description: Hesketh and Low 1968, Hoffman and Rawlins = 80.

embryo.description: dry weight of seedling at emergence

f_leaf.description: proportion of leaf dry weight at emergence

f_root.description: ditto for root - data by extrapolation from Huxlry

elevation_default.description: default elevation for calculating advection in eo calculation

wlog_carcap_red_stress.description: carrying capacity reduction with waterlogging after stress

smi_affect_wlog.description: level of water stress below which could affect waterlogging

days_relief_wlog.description: number of days of stress relief after which has no effect on waterlogging

frost_kill_immediate.description: min temperature below which immediate kill

harvest_n_frac.description: fraction of uptake N for potential N harvested; 0.85 from Constable and Rochester

relp_smi_crit.description: critical level of smi below which it affects pp

fert_crit.description: minimum change in NO3 attributed to fertiliser application

fert_detect.description: minimum change in NO3 attributed to fertiliser application

days_since_fert_max.description: maximum days between fertiliser application and sowing for inclusion as fertiliser in available N.

sqcon.description: governs pot rate of squaring in thermal time

fcutout.description: relates timing of cutut to boll load

flai.description: modifying ratio of leaf area per site for this cultivar

FRUDD.description: dd to change of category (fruit dd)
